name: Ceramic Tile Wall Plaque-All About the Love
description:
This is a unique ceramic tile wall plaque. I use as many recycled/upcycled materials as possible when making my art and often re-use magazine ads, calendars, postcards, junk mail pieces, menus, greeting cards and anything else that inspires me.

This bright and beautiful tile wall plaque is 100% UNIQUE. The same piece can never be duplicated, so buy these with the knowledge that you are purchasing a truly one-of-a-kind piece. This tile measures approximately 6x8 inches. Tiny scrap paper pieces are applied to the top of each tile with a transparent gloss medium to allow the color and texture of each piece to shine through. A high gloss sealer is then applied in multiple coats to ensure longevity, quality, and durability of these mini works of art. The backside has a soda pop tab/top used for hanging purposes that is affixed with super strong epoxy. 

This wall plaque offers a unique and eye catching way to display a small sized work of art, while also inspiring others with the uplifting visual message it contains. Each piece is lovingly created and attention to detail is always apparent. I can also do custom ceramic coasters or wall plaques with any inspirational word or message you prefer, including a general choice of preferred use of colors. I can also make custom order from your personal photographs. 

Tile size is 6"x8".

Please allow approximately one week for delivery.

*Tiles can be wiped clean with a damp cloth but are NOT safe for dishwasher use. They should never be used as trivets.

name: 4 Ceramic Coaster Set-Musings with Birds
description:
This bird themed coaster set features four vibrant original images from my personally created art collection. All coasters are created from photographs of my original tile wall art.

Each coaster measures approximately 4.25" inches square and has been backed with a square foam pad for secure/slip proof footing and to protect furniture when in use. 

Each coaster features an original image handmade by me. The image is printed on high gloss photo paper and then applied to the ceramic tile. Each piece is then coated with a high shine gloss resin finish that withstands both heat and cold, making them more durable and lasting than varnish coated coasters. The pictures do not capture the brilliant shine and color of these coasters!

The coasters offer a unique and eye catching way to display some small works of art in your home. Each collection is lovingly created at my kitchen table and quality, originality, and value are always considered. 

Each piece will vary in slightly in texture, finish, color, and seal...but I have a great attention to detail so purchase with confidence. 

Coasters can be wiped clean with a damp cloth and should NOT be used as trivets or put in the dishwasher.
